content: this legal text summarizes a court case involving the dissolution of a legal community property between two parties the court has declared the dissolution and ordered the assets to be divided equally between the parties both parties had made various claims and counterclaims regarding expenses and assets but the court rejected the counterclaims the court has determined that the remaining common assets amount to €1268102 one party has been ordered to pay the other party €634051 plus interest the court has also suggested compensating both parties for the costs of the proceedings overall the court has made a final decision disregarding objections and has dissolved the property divided the assets and ordered payment and compensation

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale S.Maria Capua V. sez. I, 13/11/2017, n.3372
